mapper.select: SELECT NO ,CC.CODE_NAME AS CAR_NAME ,NC.CAR_TYPE_CODE ,NC.CAR_FUEL_CODE ,FN_COMM_NM(NC.CAR_FUEL_CODE) AS FUEL_NAME FROM NEW_CAR NC, COMMON_CODE CC WHERE NC.CAR_NAME_CODE = CONCAT(CC.GROUP_CODE, CC.CODE) AND NC.CAR_NAME_CODE = #{carNameCode}

SELECT RN , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , CAR_TYPE_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_TYPE_CODE) AS CAR_TYPE , CAR_NAME_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_NAME_CODE) AS CAR_NAME , CAR_FUEL_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_FUEL_CODE) AS CAR_FUEL , COMPANY , FN_COMM_NAME(COMPANY) AS COMPANY_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by CAR_TYPE_CODE) AS RN , RENTAL_CAR.* FROM RENTAL_CAR WHERE DELIVERY_DATE IS NULL)
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}

SELECT CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , CAR_TYPE_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_TYPE_CODE) AS CAR_TYPE , CAR_NAME_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_NAME_CODE) AS CAR_NAME , CAR_FUEL_CODE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_FUEL_CODE) AS CAR_FUEL , COMPANY , FN_COMM_NAME(COMPANY) AS COMPANY_NAME FROM RENTAL_CAR WHERE CAR_NAME_CODE = #{code} AND DELIVERY_DATE IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENTAL_CAR_BRANCHES_CAR ( CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , REG_ID , REG_DATE) VALUES ( #{car} , #{branch} , 'SYSTEM' , SYSDATE)
